release.action: Most components Branch registry-gtr-1188. JNDI keys shortened so they fit Tomcat's interface.

astrogrid/filestore, astrogrid/filemanagerand astrogrid/integrationTests aginab_jdt_1177 Plumbed the FileStore and FileManager installers into AGINAB. The GUI installers and AGINAB now use the same script for deployment, which has got to be a good thing.
astrogrid/applications Branch cea-gtr-1208. Enhancements to the JSPs for test-running an application that support indirect input parameters.
astrogrid/applications and astrogrid/integrationTests cea_jdt_1180 Minor bug fixes to installer and build. Also fixes bug 1182 (for CEA only).
Changes to TableMetaDoc.xsd to make it match the DSA software. Branch dsa-gtr-1027 Waiting for a big merge from mch before proceeding.
dave-dev-200506100249 Changes to navigate and header
astrogrid/workflow + portal resources Branch portalRE_pjn_1200 + workflow_pjn_1200 Only active tasks returned from registry in both workflow builder and resource browser.
dave-dev-200506081212 - Bug fixes to the pal metadata generator.No external side effects expected.
dave-dev-200506071500 - Fixed double(), power() and circle() in PostgreSQL SQL writer.

desktop-nww-1111 and workflow-nww-1111 - added Applications component to ACR, and Applications Launcher Proglet. This branch has already been merged into head once - hope merging it again doesn't cause trouble .
portal_pjn_1225 - microbrowserResults.xsl change to handle tables with '+' in their name
portal_pjn_1217 - Webstart applications page added with more information.
portalRE_pjn_1226 - the smallest branch ever! - single missing space in ResourceAction.java causing SAXParseException when muliple keyword search attempted when looking for catalogs.
Branch portalWF_1193_pjn Fix for orig. bug #942 which has been over-written at some point since Feb.
portal_pjn_1218 - Astrogrid status added to homepage plus ability to take portal 'out of action'
MCH-v1 v1.0 release for datacenter, slinger and xml projects. (awaiting for root tag from Martin)
Doc_Template_KMB_May112005 - docs template for astrogrid/registry
Doc_Template_KMB_May112005Comm - docs template for astrogrid/community
portalWF_pjn_1191 - fixes for parameter indirect flag in workflow builder

Since we're now on maven 1.0.2 I've refactored the property files to remove common and duplicated stuff to maven-base. All components will need to be rebuilt after this merge, which should have no side effects. Branch maven_jdt_383:

cea_jdt_1012 Created Installers for the CEA apps and plumbed them into AGINAB. Added some cea-cmdline tests for windows. The windows tests will fail on Unix. Equally the Unix tests will fail on Windows, so we should get the same pass rate in both environments.

portalWF_pjn_1169 1169 is a minor layout change and also removes a couple of stylesheet attributes that were causing transform errors that I spotted in the portal-core logs. However this also includes fix for bug#931 which is more serious and relates to workflow builder/m-b interactions.
portal_pfo_1106 taking out the excute button for now from query page since it's not working anyway. see bug 1172
portal_pjn_1157 Parameterized workflows added to portal
desktop-nww-1111 Lots of minor fixes and improvements to desktop - mostly suggested by Nick. Plus javadoc.

Added an about page to each war. Not going to rebuild just for this... will let it be absorbed naturally as new builds take place. However if there are any problems building war files then this should be your first suspect! Contact jdt in case of problems. Branch all_jdt_1056
Taken out cicle from query example. Branch portal_pfo_1106
Fix int tests to use new filemanager. Should see improvments in the applications tests. Branch int-nww-1125
(astrogrid/common) - now uses InputSource? for newDocument(string) Fixed bug with certain characters in DOM. Branch Reg_KMB_381_WS
(astrogrid/registry) - fixed several small bugs plus fixed relationship query now. Added removeResource ability. Fixed major bug with embedded eXist. Branch Reg_KMB_381_WS

(astrogrid/registry/webapp) - Yes I know a sub-branch below registry in the webapp directory. Small changes to jsp pages and added removeResource. Xforms stuff is in there, but still hidden because it does not still quite work. Branch Reg_KMB_381_Xforms
(astrogrid/xmldb) - Small change to add removeResource and a few other storage type methods. Branch Reg_KMB_972
Fixed how it queries on relationships on the registry for groupmembership area. Branch Comm_KMB_381_WS

(astrogrid/integrationTests/auto-integration) - bad branch name should have been a different number. Anyways small fixes to registry-entries. And added community stress test. Branch Reg_Comm_1008_Factor
(astrogrid/filestore) - A small change to the xml to add relationship elements to it now. Branch FS_KMB_1004_2
(astrogrid/portal/workflow) Jobs displayed in date order. Branch portalWF_pjn_930
Fix for 'delete' and 'move' bugs. minor changes to filemanager-client and filemanager-server.bug. Branch filemanager-nww-1035
Removed footer from workflow and job status pages; help links now temporarily point to wikki help page. Branch portal_pjn_748
Ensure workflow credentials match user credentials on submit, set to those of current user if different. Branch portalWF_1100_pjn
Ability to delete optional parameters. Branch portalWF_pjn_860
Major speed improvement to job status pages, plus removed some more trace. Branch portalWF_pjn_959
Declares environment entities in web.xml and adds activation-1.0.2.jar to the WAR. Branch applications-gtr-1074
Improvements to MySpace Explorer to ensure views were updated to show latest file activity of user. Branch wor-jl-1085
Improvements to MySpace Explorer to ensure views were updated to show latest file activity of user. Branch por-jl-1046 (1046 is dependent upon 1085.)
Changes to use Noels fix (jes-nww-776-again), plus changes to front page job list to remove delete/cancel buttons, plus bug #771. Branch portal_pjn_766_again

Fix for displaying list of jobs efficiently (jes-delegate and jes-server). Also some performance tweaks to the jes server. NB - this requires the common-nww-1035 to be merged first. Branch jes-nww-776-again and workflow-objects-nww-776-again

Moved some common classes from filemanager to common (nameGen package)., so they can be reused in jes. Not expected to break anything. Filemanager client needs to be rebuilt at the same time. Branch common-nww-1035
Same problmes of adding utils dependencies testing together. Branch jes_clq_1120/wf_clq_1120/por_clq_1120
Fixed storeclient/xml/status overwriting AG main site docs. Branch sc_clq_1079
Removed MySpace related tests from integration. Branch dave-dev-200503181302
In astrogrid/community/webapp, added new JSP and web.xml files. Branch Comm_KMB_1008_2
Fixed FileManager web.xml config settings. Branch dave-dev-200504041023
slight tweak to the installer to make it less confusing. No effect on int tests. Branch Filestore_jdt_1033
trace turned off in worflow xsp's (job-list and job-status) Branch portalWF_pjn_1045
links to workflow in current jobs list on homepage removed (login-pass.xsp, workflow sitemap and job-list.xsl). Branch portal_pjn_1054
The last test run's results are now saved, so even if you don't stick the baseline in cvs,you can immediately see if anything has changed since last time you ran aginab. Branch aginab_jdt_1062.
In astrogrid/registry, ONLY .JSP AND .WSDL files should be merged. Branch Reg_KMB_972_2
Portal myspace update and etc. Branch por-jl-908
DesignAction changed to add missing ivo:// to indirect ivorns. Branch portalWF_pjn_1047
In astrogrid/registry; harvest bug fixed, commenting better now; in astrogrid/xmldb; small tweak to let a user get right at a XQueryService? or XPathQueryService?. Branch Reg_KMB_972
Rebuilds of PAL and slinger
Adding wsdd from workflow-objects to wars. Branch pal_jdt_1044
New webstart links; only affects login-pass.xsp. Branch portalLogin_pjn_1040
Filemanager jsp. Branch FM_KMB_1007
Added an installer. Branch FMGR_JDT_1031
Adjustments to the schema for configuring catalogues inside DSA. This is important for the current deployments. Branch dsa-gtr-1021
Added a subproject to create a single jar from all the dependencies. Branch Slinger_jdt_1022
Filestore jsp. Branch FS_KMB_1004
Added a deployment script and installer, integration tests should be unaffected. Branch JES_jdt_1005
FileStore? Installer. No impact expected on Int Tests, since I've just added a couple of subprojects to build the installer and deployment script. Branch FLSTR_JDT_966
For integrationTests some entries changed for registry v10 upgrade. Branch Reg_KMB_972
Upgraded jes to use groovy-beta-10 - which claims to fix some memory leaks. No impact expected on integration tests. Branch jes-nww-986
For registry and portal fixes a small harvest bug, it should work fine with TabularDB now. Branch Reg_KMB_972
Registry to v1.0.
Adjusted int tests for cea and jes to use FileManager. Branch auto-integration-nww-994
Installation instructions for FileStore, also added a test suite for deployed services (see deploy sub-project). Branch dave-dev-200503140252
Infrastructure for dispatching other kinds of step / random select of servers to dispatch to / upgrade picocontainer to 1.1 / moved from myspace to filemanager. Branch jes-nww-686
Small tweak to support jes-nww-686. Branch common-nww-686
Moves workflow over to using filemanager. Branch workflow-nww-996
Moves scripting over to using filemanager. Branch scripting-nww-995
Moved cea over to using fileManager. Branch cea-nww-994
Added webstart applications link to home page (login-pass.xsp and minor tweak to microbrowserResults.xsl). Branch portalWEBSTART_pjn_838
Removed bogus dependency on astrogird-datacenter-client. Adjusted one deprecatred class so it won't be missed. Don't expect it to effect anything else. Branch scripting-nww-975

Refactored client and server, implemented persistence for node metadata, node caching on client, bundling on server, getIvorn() returns homespace-style Ivorns, WSDL-based SOAP (to be moved into contracts later), deprecated and implemented Aladin Adapter interfaces. Branch filemanager-nww-jdt-903-943
Alterations to config for filestores, new integration tests. Branch Auto-integration-nww-965
Minor change to a mock to support filemanager build. Branch filestore-nww-965

JavaScript fix aimed at Windows IE6. MySpace micro-browser should now work. (BTW...I've not bothered to include testing for files created with folders of the same name. I've tried but cannot reproduce the error now. Some extra checking should/needs to be included, but this part will be rewritten soon in any case.) [accidently committed to head by jeff - small changes] Branch por-jl-904
Branch portalRESOURCE_pjn_979
Shift to new resource browser style for microbrowsers. Branch portalWF_pjn_720

First release of contracts project. Please merge only astrogrid/contracts and astrogrid-software-site; no other parts of CVS need to change. Note that the build of the software site now has a dependency on the astrogrid-contracts jar in order to publish the schemata. The contracts project needs to be added to the scheduled build and to be given a version number in the maven-base properties. Branch gtr-contracts-BZ945
Prevent parameters being removed when step details change. Branch portalWF_PJN_942
Branch REG_kmb_889/REG_kmb_889_2
Community (changes to web.xml from KMB); had to change LoginAction see version 1.35. Branch Reg_KMB_913
Some changes to the logging to make it easier to obtain usage metrics via a script from the log files. Branch community_pah_910
Some changes to the logging to make it easier to obtain usage metrics via a script from the log files. Branch myspace_pah_910
Viewer and editor for web.xml. Branch GTR-properties-BZ879

Filemanager - Fixed failing server tests; Modified client and mock implementations to enable Portal dev on a full mock service. Added full mock test sample, in example project. Changes to FileManager? client and server, added FileManager example. List of changed files is here, no conflicts expected Build logs from local integration build docs and logs Integration test results on local machine results. Branch dave-dev-200502010902
Branch filemanager-nww-903
Community webapp not building under Maven 1.0.2. Branch COMM_JDT_936.
Registry not building under Maven 1.0.2 due to mismatch between package and directory structure. Temporary fix. Branch POR_JDT_933

1. Rationalising config properties 2. Redirecting the logs to $CATALINA_HOME/logs to allow a clean uninstall on windows 3. Creation of a graphical installer Note: the portal now requires the javaapp plugin for Maven. This can be installed by executing maven -Dmaven.repo.remote= http://www.ibiblio.org,http://maven-plugins.sf.net/maven -DartifactId=javaapp -DgroupId= maven-plugins -Dversion=1.3 plugin:download.
Added configuration pages to FileStore webapp.
Created a graphical installer for the JES. Download from here.
Created a graphical installer for FileStore. Download from here.
New xmldb project for Registry.
Added some logging to myspace and community

Created some jsp pages to allow admins to edit web.xmls when our components are deployed in Tomcat containers. JSP pages have been put into the common project, but will need to be copied out by anyone that wants to use them in their wars.
Community now builds under Maven 1.0.2
Registry now builds under Maven 1.0.2
Created a graphical installer for the portal. Download from here.
Portal now undeploys cleanly. (fixed as part of bug 882)
All config properties are now set in web.xml. Obsolete properties removed.
some very small config changes for the AVO demo
An update to cea-http (ie SIAP applications), required following changes to the registry.
A fix to the myspace interface requested by the Aladin team.

MySpace Explorer changes aimed largely at (1) eliminating errant nesting of folders. There appear to be three sources for this error. Two have been eliminated. The other (introducing a file on the same level as a folder with the same name) I am raising another bug for. But also included...(2) Tidied up headings and field names on micro-browser. and (3) Partly strengthened the error checking on the m-b aswell.
Pending....
Build problem in eXist for maven 1.0.1+
registry entries should be validated by a schema
Need to add eXist permissiong with username and passwords more restrictive on the updates.
Misc updates to community and registry.

release.description: The release demonstrated at the AstroGrid consortium meeting
release.action: Cosmetic tweak to portal
myspace browser perf. enhancements
Pat's fixes for metadata WFS and registry browse
Summary objects return more data.
New Slinger project.
Added some VOTable arithmetic
FileManager project integrated into AGINAB
Second community. Deploying the second community was causing setup problems. Some tests associated with the second community have obviously regressed.
New Aggregate project.
New FileManager project.
New Slinger project.
Browsing for Tools picks up Extraneous Material

The iteration 6 release offers a large number of enhancements and fixes over iteration 5, including:
A graphical query builder
SIAP services
An enhanced mySpace Explorer
Real datasets in AGINAB
more.....
